Posts.EditableText: I can't figure out the word choice to take the medicine.  Am I missing something?
Posts.HTML: I can't figure out the word choice to take the medicine. Am I missing something?

Posts.EditableText:
Mmm, that surprises me, unless I've missed the obvious.

The vial contains a 'yellowed liquid', so do what you normally would with a liquid that's meant to be taken orally.
